_a-0000ed08-d796-8000-9dda-011c48011c48_.name: AS_CO_UT_Filter
_a-0000ed08-d796-8000-9dda-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!fieldValuePairs: a!defaultValue(
    value: ri!fieldValuePairs,
    default: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
      items: a!flatten(ri!field),
      expression: a!map(
        field: fv!item,
        value: if(
          fv!itemCount = 1,
          ri!value,
          index(a!flatten(ri!value), fv!index, null)
        )
      )
    )
  ),
  local!matchingCriteria: a!defaultValue(
    value: ri!matchingCriteria,
    default: "ALL"
  ),
  local!matchType: a!defaultValue(value: ri!matchType, default: "EXACT"),
  local!matchIndices: if(
    a!isNullOrEmpty(a!flatten(ri!records)),
    tointeger({}),
    reduce(
      rule!AS_CO_UT_Filter_Reducer(
        matchingCriteria: local!matchingCriteria,
        previousIndices: _,
        records: a!flatten(ri!records),
        fieldValuePair: _,
        matchType: local!matchType
      ),
      a!match(
        value: local!matchingCriteria,
        equals: "ALL",
        then: enumerate(count(a!flatten(ri!records))) + 1,
        equals: "ANY",
        then: {},
        default: fn!error(
          "Invalid matchingCriteria, must be one of: ALL, ANY"
        )
      ),
      local!fieldValuePairs
    )
  ),
  local!rejectIndices: difference(
    if(
      a!isNullOrEmpty(ri!records),
      tointeger({}),
      enumerate(count(a!flatten(ri!records))) + 1
    ),
    local!matchIndices
  ),
  local!matches: cast(
    runtimetypeof(ri!records),
    index(ri!records, local!matchIndices, {})
  ),
  local!rejects: cast(
    runtimetypeof(ri!records),
    index(ri!records, local!rejectIndices, {})
  ),
  local!output: a!match(
    value: a!defaultValue(value: ri!filterType, default: "FILTER"),
    equals: "FILTER",
    then: local!matches,
    equals: "REJECT",
    then: local!rejects,
    equals: "FIRST_MATCH",
    then: index(local!matches, 1, null),
    equals: "FIRST_REJECT",
    then: index(local!rejects, 1, null),
    equals: "MATCH_COUNT",
    then: count(local!matchIndices),
    equals: "REJECT_COUNT",
    then: count(local!rejectIndices),
    equals: "MATCH_INDICES",
    then: local!matchIndices,
    equals: "REJECT_INDICES",
    then: local!rejectIndices,
    equals: "FULL_RESULT",
    then: a!map(
      matches: local!matches,
      rejects: local!rejects,
      firstMatch: index(local!matches, 1, null),
      firstReject: index(local!rejects, 1, null),
      matchCount: count(local!matchIndices),
      rejectCount: count(local!rejectIndices),
      matchIndices: local!matchIndices,
      rejectIndices: local!rejectIndices
    ),
    default: fn!error(
      "Invalid filterType, must be one of: FILTER, REJECT, FIRST_MATCH, FIRST_REJECT, MATCH_COUNT, REJECT_COUNT, MATCH_INDICES, REJECT_INDICES, FULL_RESULT"
    )
  ),
  local!output
)

_a-0000ec50-376f-8000-9d94-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_getColorBasedOnColorName
_a-0000ec50-376f-8000-9d94-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
a!match(
  value: ri!colorName,
  /* White Colors */
  equals: "WHITE",
  then: cons!AS_GCM_HEX_CODE_WHITE,
  equals: "WHITE_2",
  then: cons!AS_GCM_HEX_CODE_WHITE_2,
  /* Gray Colors */
  equals: "GRAY_0",
  then: cons!AS_GCM_HEX_CODE_GRAY_0,
  equals: "GRAY_1",
  then: "#EDEDF2",
  equals: "GRAY_2",
  then: "#DCDCE5",
  equals: "GRAY_3",
  then: cons!AS_GCM_HEX_CODE_GRAY_3,
  equals: "GRAY_4",
  then: "#2E2E35",
  /* Orange Colors */
  equals: "ORANGE_1",
  then: "#FFEED3",
  equals: "ORANGE_2",
  then: "#FFDCA3",
  equals: "ORANGE_3",
  then: "#FAA92F",
  equals: "ORANGE_4",
  then: "#995C00",
  /* Blue Colors */
  equals: "BLUE_0",
  then: cons!AS_GCM_HEX_CODE_BLUE_0,
  equals: "BLUE_1",
  then: cons!AS_GCM_HEX_CODE_BLUE_1,
  equals: "BLUE_2",
  then: "#AFBFF8",
  equals: "BLUE_3",
  then: "#2322F0",
  equals: "BLUE_4",
  then: cons!AS_GCM_HEX_CODE_BLUE_4,
  equals: "BLUE_5",
  then: "#E9EDFC",
  equals: "BLUE_6",
  then: "#08088D",
  equals: "BLUE_7",
  then: "#DCDEF5",
  /* Green Colors  */
  equals: "GREEN_1",
  then: "#E3FBDF",
  equals: "GREEN_4",
  then: "#117C00",
  /* Teal Colors */
  equals: "TEAL_1",
  then: "#E2FAF9",
  equals: "TEAL_3",
  then: "#56ADC0",
  equals: "TEAL_4",
  then: "#2C6770",
  /* Purple Colors */
  equals: "PURPLE_1",
  then: "#F2E9FF",
  equals: "PURPLE_3",
  then: "#B561FF",
  equals: "PURPLE_4",
  then: "#790DA1",
  /* Red Colors */
  equals: "RED_4",
  then: "#9F0019",
  /* Yellow Colors */
  equals: "YELLOW_0",
  then: "#FFFCEB",
  equals: "YELLOW_1",
  then: "#FFF6C9",
  equals: "YELLOW_4",
  then: "#856C00",
  /* Appian Colors */
  equals: "APPIAN_BACKGROUND",
  then: cons!AS_GCM_HEX_CODE_APPIAN_BACKGROUND,
  equals: "ACCENT",
  then: "#2322f0",
  default: ri!colorName
)

_a-0000ec62-ac34-8000-9d9a-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_CEDM_typeConfigMapForDataMigration
_a-0000ec62-ac34-8000-9d9a-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
/*
a!map(
      uuid: <UUID of the record or Data Type>,
            <UUID_1 denotes the replica of a record for a different exporting purpose>
            Eg: UUID - 66fc3179-f0d8-4d6d-bbce-92b85f7c665a -- foreignKeyField: questionnaireTemplateID
                UUID_1 - 66fc3179-f0d8-4d6d-bbce-92b85f7c665a_1 -- foreignKeyField: null
      groupUuid: <UUID used to group the data together during Export>,
      recordType: <RecordType reference when the uuid is of a record>,
      dataStoreEntity: <DSE Constant when the uuid is of a data type>,
      entityType: <Entity type when the uuid is of a data type>,
      displayName: <Used to display in the frontend during export>,
      userDisplayName: <Used to display to the end user>,
      isIndependentExportable: <Determines if this record is exportable independently/parent record>,
      primaryKeyField: <Primary key field>,
      foreignKeyField: <Field which will used to filter data based on precedent record field maps>,
      createdByField: <created by field for capturing metadata>,
      createdDatetimeField: <created datetime field for capturing metadata>,
      modifiedByField: <modified by field for capturing metadata>,
      modifiedDatetimeField: <modified datetime field for capturing metadata>,
      metadataFields: <All the metadata fields except isActive field which would be used to check if any field is changed except these fields>,
      customRecordFields:<The custom record fields of the record type>,
      primaryIdentifierFields: <The fields used to uniquely identify a record usually crossEnvironmentUuid>,
      secondaryIdentifierFields: <The fields which would be used to identify the record when primaryIdentifier fields don't match>,
      precedentRecordFieldMaps: <The foreignKey references present in current record which needs to be updated when there is a new record creation happened for these precedentRecordUuid>,
      dependentRecordUuids: <The record uuids which needs to be exported mandatorily when this current record is exported>,
      allowedOperations: <Allows values are "CREATE" and "UPDATE" which means if this records can add new rows in the target environment or can it only allow updates>,
      order: <The order in which the records will be exported or imported>,
      writeBatchSize: <The Batch size in which the data needs to be written>,
      queryBatchSize: <The batch size in which the data needs to be queried>,
      exportBatchSize: <Specifies the number of records per document when batching the data into multiple documents>,
      exportWithoutParent: <Boolean field to define whether to export the records without the parent data>,
      exportFilters: <Field to capture the filters that are to be applied on the record during export>,
      isActiveField: <Field to reference the record's isActive field>,
      importRejectionMaps: <Field to capture the maps that are to be rejected if null during the import>,
      nonWritableRelationships: <Field to capture the record relationships that are to be ignored during import write>
    )
*/
a!localVariables(
  local!bundle: rule!AS_GCM_CO_UT_loadBundleFromFolder(langISOCode: null),
  local!configMaps: {
    /* Questionnaire related records are excluded as the questionnaire synced record migration is still in progress

  Refer: https://issues.appian.com/browse/GAM-12105


  Pass a setMetaData rule reference below with key setMetadataRuleRef for special metadata calculation. For example refer AS GCM R Clause Record
  */
    a!map(
      uuid: "12b3d808-5bcd-47fa-8f90-8bc2b78b9553",
      groupUuid: "12b3d808-5bcd-47fa-8f90-8bc2b78b9553",
      recordType: recordType!AS GCM R Data,
      displayName: "Reference Data",
      isIndependentExportable: true,
      primaryKeyField: recordType!AS GCM R Data.refDataId,
      foreignKeyField: null,
      createdByField: recordType!AS GCM R Data.createdBy,
      createdDatetimeField: recordType!AS GCM R Data.createdDatetime,
      modifiedByField: recordType!AS GCM R Data.modifiedBy,
      modifiedDatetimeField: recordType!AS GCM R Data.modifiedDatetime,
      /* The below fields will be retained from the target env   */
      metadataFields: {
        recordType!AS GCM R Data.createdBy,
        recordType!AS GCM R Data.createdDatetime,
        recordType!AS GCM R Data.modifiedBy,
        recordType!AS GCM R Data.modifiedDatetime
      },
      customRecordFields: {},
      primaryIdentifierFields: {
        recordType!AS GCM R Data.refDataId
      },
      secondaryIdentifierFields: null,
      precedentRecordFieldMaps: null,
      /* Indicates the records which are mandatorily updated or written to database when this parent is updated     */
      dependentRecordUuids: null,
      allowedOperations: "UPDATE",
      order: 1,
      exportBatchSize: cons!AS_GCM_CO_INT_QUERY_RECORD_MAX_BATCH_SIZE
    ),
    a!map(
      uuid: "eb8317e5-4eb6-4d46-8cd5-9ebcfafd6b67",
      groupUuid: "eb8317e5-4eb6-4d46-8cd5-9ebcfafd6b67",
      recordType: recordType!AS GCM Fill In Recommendation,

      isIndependentExportable: true,
      primaryKeyField: recordType!AS GCM Fill In Recommendation.fillInRecId,
      foreignKeyField: null,
      createdByField: recordType!AS GCM Fill In Recommendation.createdBy,
      createdDatetimeField: recordType!AS GCM Fill In Recommendation.createdDatetime,
      modifiedByField: recordType!AS GCM Fill In Recommendation.modifiedBy,

    a!map(
